name: contact
description: A backend API for a contact form web application, built with Node.js, Express, and MongoDB. Features include a RESTful API for managing contacts, input validation, rate limiting, logging with Winston, and interactive API documentation using Swagger. The project serves a static frontend (HTML, CSS, JS) from the public directory. See the frontend demo at https://manthanank.github.io/contact/.
author: Manthan Ankolekar
